segments.text: What are you going to do ? Are you going to work late ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I'm not . I'm going to look for an apartment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm going to try to find a place near the office .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Out in the suburbs . It's a long trip to work every day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How are you going to find an apartment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm going to buy a newspaper and check the classified ads .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Apartments in the city are expensive .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know , but I'm going to enroll in a night school to take a course in business management .
segments.speaker: S2
